newCentre.title: New Omar Ibn Al Khattab Centre
newCentre.description: For years, the Omar bin-al-Khattab centre has been the heart of our community. A place of worship, learning and connection. But as our community grows, so do our needs. The current centre, though vibrant and full of life, is bursting at the seams. We have reached a point of saturation where our beloved centre can no longer adequately serve the needs of our expanding community. However, there is hope in the horizon.
newCentre.vision: Introducing the new Omar bin-al-Khattab centre, a beacon of progress and possibility. This purpose-built facility will be more than just a building. It will be a hub of activity. A place where our children can learn and grow, where families can come together in prayer and fellowship and where the bonds of community are strengthened.
newCentre.callToAction: But we can't do this alone. We need your help to turn this vision into reality. Together we can build a centre that not only meets the needs of today, but anticipates the needs of tomorrow. Donate now and be a part of something truly transformative, empowering our community, building our future.

features.title: Community Hub
features.description: A central gathering place for worship, learning, and fellowship

features.title: Educational Facilities
features.description: Modern classrooms and learning spaces for children and adults

features.title: Expanded Capacity
features.description: Purpose-built to accommodate our growing community

features.title: Future-Ready Design
features.description: Built to anticipate and meet tomorrow's needs
